message:
Egyptian Geeks Workshop - 2 - Software Estimation
Thanks everyone for showing up today, we had a record turnaround :)
name: Egyptian Geeks Workshop - 2

data.message: Awesome, can't wait to watch it.

I'm really enjoying this. Geeks hanging out, it's the best :)
I have two things to ask (that are really just one thing):
- Is it possible to display an avatar instead of the black screen for users with no video?
- Is it possible to display the speaker name under their video/avatar? It's a good chance to know who people are.
I'm being really picky, I know :)
I will check Google+ hangout settings, the interesting thing that during the hangout the avatars appear when you have no cam
I was a nice hangout guys, really enjoyed it. I would recommend to have an agenda for the next time, the topics that we can speak about.

Concerning yesterday's discussion, there are open-source libraries for feature flipping for .net

https://github.com/msarchet/flipper
https://github.com/timscott/flipit

Unfortunately they don't have UI for feature switching
WoOoW, We stayed for a 1:24:00 mins. It didn't feel that long :)
